settings.label: Settings
settings.intervalHelper: Free users are fixed at hourly. Pro can set any 10–180 min.
settings.quietHoursHelper: Pause reminders during your sleep or focus hours. Re-download the .ics file after changing hours to ensure DST-correct calendar events.

pro.unlockDescription: Custom intervals, quiet hours, personalized reminders, and more.

safety.title: Safety Notice
safety.description: These are gentle suggestions, not medical advice. Stop if you feel pain, dizziness, or numbness. Consult a professional if unsure.
safety.inclusivityText: Every exercise includes a quiet alternative for discreet practice. Use the settings to show only seated or upper-body options if standing exercises aren't suitable for you.
safety.consultText: If you have existing injuries, chronic conditions, or are pregnant, please consult a healthcare provider before starting any new movement practice.

privacy.title: Privacy & Data
privacy.privacyFirstText: BreakBreath is built with your privacy in mind. All your data stays on your device—we don't collect or store any personal information on servers.
privacy.noLoginText: Use the app instantly without creating an account. Your settings, streaks, and preferences are stored locally in your browser's storage.
privacy.offlineText: Once loaded, BreakBreath works without an internet connection. Perfect for privacy-conscious users and offline use.
privacy.thirdPartyText: This site uses Google AdSense for optional advertisements (with your consent via the cookie banner). Ads may use cookies to serve personalized content based on your browsing. You can decline at any time.
privacy.clearDataText: All local data can be cleared by clearing your browser's storage or using incognito/private browsing mode.

region.title: Region & Hosting
region.auHostedText: BreakBreath is hosted in Australia. While the app works globally, our infrastructure is based in AU for compliance with local data protection standards.
region.globalAccessText: The app is accessible worldwide. All features work regardless of your location, and local storage ensures your data never leaves your device.

notifications.browserSupport: Browser notifications now; calendar file for guaranteed hourly alerts.
notifications.permissionDenied: Notification permission denied. Please enable in browser settings.

cookie.title: We use cookies and personalized ads.
cookie.message: This site uses Google AdSense, which may serve personalized ads based on your browsing. By continuing, you consent to cookies and personalized advertising. See our Privacy Policy for details.
